item.title: Quals: Algeria National CTF 2020 (Cyber Talents) — Write-up.
item.description: Introduction (The original article can be found on Medium) A relatively easy and fun CTF, challenges are ordered by difficulty easiest being the first, and so on. Let’s just jump right into it. The Write-up is as beginner-friendly and detailed as possible. 1. Last Name (General Information). Question: What is the last name of the Linux creator? Answer: Torvalds. 2. X-File (Digital Forensics). We download “dump.txt” and after reading it we notice that it’s a hexdump that looks like so,
